name: Blackthorn Witch
description:
Blackthorn Witch is a single player, story driven horror RPG taking place in  the present day. You play as Mattew Thomson, a young man that has lost his mother and father in a car accident.

Erick Thomson, Mattew younger brother is becoming a small internet star so he decides to take on a fan request to camp in the mysterious blackthorn forest...

Blackthorn Witch is a horror RPG  adventure game.

Gameplay:

 Explore 

 Colect useful items and weapons 

 Solve Puzzles

 Avoid enemys            

 Fight back in a classic turn base style.
